The program now checks for updates on your GitHub repository instead of the original one:

| Configuration | Old Value | New Value |

The format of your GitHub link is compatible with the `electron-updater` library used by the application. When the app checks for updates, it will now fetch release information from your repository's releases page, including the V2.17.0 tag you specified.
